about_the_game:
Demo Content


This demo provides for you the experience of the first three levels in the Edward's Manor adventure. You'll learn the basic mechanics of the game, and encounter the entity that roams around the halls. The final game, will provide you with all the context you need to learn what happened to the Edwards.

Story


Edward's Manor is a historical family house in the central region of Chile. Built in 1779, it has been the home of the most important and wealthiest families in the country. Suddenly, they've decided to relocate to Europe, and it is your job to make sure everything is in order before the movers come.

Features


  • Tag the pending furniture from the moving company.
  • Survive the dangers that lurk inside and outside the house.

Feedback

We will read every review to make our best game possible. Expect updates for this demo constantly, we will listen to your feedback, it is much appreciated!

legal_notice: This is a work of fiction. Unless otherwise indicated, all the names, characters, businesses, places, events, and incidents in this video game are either the product of the author's imagination or used in a fictitious manner. Any resemblance to actual individuals, living or dead, or actual events is purely coincidental.
name: Edward's Manor Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD 2.5 GHz or superior
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 or DirectX 12 compatible graphics card with at least 4 GB VRAM (e.g., NVIDIA GTX 1050 or AMD Radeon RX 570)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 646 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: The Edwards are moving! And luckily for you, that comes with a paycheck. Help tag the pending furniture for Don Jorge's Moving Company. We are counting on you! Disclosure: D.J.M.C. is not liable for any damages or deaths during your work hours.
